text: Spišská Nová Ves (; ) is a town in the Košice Region in Slovakia. The town is southeast of the High Tatras in the Spiš region. It is the largest town in the Spišská Nová Ves District. About 35,000 people live there. The main sights of Spišská Nová Ves are the Spiš Castle and the Slovak Paradise National Park. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Košice Region
title: Spišská Nová Ves
